greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = -4*a(n-3) + 11*a(n-2) - a(n-1), a(0) = 13, a(1) = -19, a(2) = 162
comment: a(n) + A153267(n) = 4*A001519(n) (apart from initial terms). The generating floretion Z = X*Y with X = 1.5'i + 0.5i' + .25(ii + jj + kk + ee) and Y = 0.5'i + 1.5i' + .25(ii + jj + kk + ee)
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (-1, 11, -4).
results.author: _Creighton Dement_, Jan 02 2009
